description: A group of more than 100 Republican lawmakers is asking for an investigation into the amount of federal funding that has been awarded to health centers that also provide abortion, including Planned Parenthood.  Sen. Marsha Blackburn (R-Tenn.), as well as House Pro-Life Caucus Co-Chair Rep. Chris Smith (R-N.J.), led a letter to the Government Accountability…
title: Republicans ask for investigation into federal funding for Planned Parenthood

description: GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin (Okla.) is holding up the promotion for a top general who oversaw the 82nd Airborne Division during the deadly 2021 U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan, a source has told The Hill and NewsNation. Lt. Gen. Christopher Donahue, President Biden’s nominee to head the U.S. Army in Europe and up for promotion to four-star general,…
title: GOP senator blocks promotion of top general who oversaw Afghanistan withdrawal

description: President-elect Trump is expected to name former Sen. Kelly Loeffler (R-Ga.) to serve as secretary of Agriculture, a source close to the transition told The Hill. Loeffler is currently the co-chair of Trump’s second inaugural committee, ahead of the January 2025 swearing in, along with real estate mogul Steve Witkoff. Loeffler briefly represented Georgia in…
title: Trump expected to name Kelly Loeffler for Agriculture secretary

description: Ohio Republican Derek Merrin has conceded in his House race against incumbent Rep. Marcy Kaptur (R-Ohio). Merrin, a member of the Ohio state House, revealed in a video on social platform X on Friday morning that he called Kaptur to congratulate her on keeping her seat and “wish her the best moving forward.”  “We knew…
title: Ohio Republican concedes to Kaptur, leaves door open for another run

description: President-elect Trump again turned to a loyalist in tapping former Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi to lead the Department of Justice. Trump named his choice just hours after former Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) on Thursday withdrew from consideration, his nomination plagued by allegations that he had sexual relations with a minor, which he denies.  The…
title: What to know about Pam Bondi, Trump’s attorney general pick

description: Ukrainians today are less optimistic for the future, nearly three years since Russia invaded the country, according to a new poll. The recent Gallup survey asked Ukrainian residents on a scale of one to 10 — where 10 is the best life — to rate their lives today. The result was an average of 6.9.…
title: Ukrainians less hopeful about future: Gallup

description: It’s time to communicate real information, not disinformation, about vaccines to ensure access and availability remain for all.
title: Vaccines have saved generations from diseases. It’s our turn to save them.

description: The Department of Justice has stopped random Drug Enforcement Administration passenger searches “mass transportation facilities,” such as airports, as of Thursday, after the department’s inspector general found concerns with how such searches were being conducted. Inspector General Michael E. Horowitz’s office said, in a press release, that the “DEA was not complying with its own policy…
title: DOJ halts random DEA passenger searches at transportation facilities

description: Donald Trump and his team will have to go through some basic training in the ways and wiles of the Northeast Asian power game.
title: Why North Korea is a wild card in the power game in Northeast Asia

description: More than three dozen Democratic and Republican lawmakers are calling on the Biden administration to offer a classified briefing on Turkey’s support for Hamas, raising concerns that the U.S.-designated terrorist group may relocate its headquarters to the NATO-allied country.  Lawmakers sent a letter to Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Director of National Intelligence Avril…
title: House members call for classified briefing on Turkey’s ties to Hamas

description: Dan Scavino, a senior advisor to Donald Trump, said Friday that the president-elect is not planning to install former Rep. Mike Rogers as the head of the FBI. “Just spoke to resident Trump regarding Mike Rogers going to the FBI. It’s not happening — In his own words, “I have never even given it a…
title: Trump won’t put Mike Rogers at FBI: Scavino

description: Only in the crazy, confused world of Washington politics could the Democrats be pointing their fingers of blame at anyone but the federal policymaker who bears much responsibility for their loss: Jerome Powell, chair of the Federal Reserve Board.
title: The irony of inflation politics (or why Trump should be nice to Fed Chair Powell)

description: Making the military completely subservient to the president would be downright dangerous.
title: A politicized military would be the Founders’ nightmare come true

description: Former FBI Director Andrew McCabe said the bureau would be endangered if Kash Patel, a former aide to President-elect Trump, is nominated and confirmed to lead the agency. “No part of the FBI’s mission is safe with Kash Patel in any position of leadership in the FBI, and certainly not in the Deputy Director’s job,”…
title: McCabe: No part of FBI mission would be safe with Kash Patel in leadership spot

description: The left's anger toward the disruptive billionaire, Tesla founder and now Donald Trump bestie is only going to get worse.
title: It’s Elon Musk’s America — and the left can’t stand it
